title: Minecraft 16w44a 发布
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:17 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。

然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。
适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.11 仍未发布，16W44A为其第14个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

Zis is ze nouveau snapsot !这是新快照！An zis snapsot inclutz…这次快照包含。。。Notable changes:显著的更新You might observer changes.你会观察到观察者的改变
Bugs fixed in 16w44a:[Bug MC-2334] - Sneaking on shorter than full blocks (chests, enchantment table…) will make you fall nonetheless在比一个完整方块矮的方块上潜行不能阻止你在边缘掉下去[Bug MC-36360] - No player sound when “Friendly Creatures” are turned off当友善生物关掉时玩家声音也没了[Bug MC-73494] - Translation for white wool and white carpet is incorrect (US)白色羊毛 地毯的名字没有颜色（只是叫羊毛/地毯 而不是白色羊毛/白色地毯）[Bug MC-86818] - Lingering and Splash Potions show invalid name in statistics滞留和投掷药水在统计里名字没有翻译[Bug MC-87364] - Missing error message for failed scoreboard players tag没有没有记分板玩家tag的错误信息的翻译[Bug MC-87989] - Wrong line when casting fishing rod in third person view在第三人称里钓鱼线不正确[Bug MC-89174] - /enchant with any invalid ID displays message “There is no such enchantment with ID 0”/enchant指令用任何不存在的附魔id的错误提示“There is no such enchantment with ID 0”[Bug MC-92105] - Splash and lingering potion ignore Ambient and ShowParticles tag滞留和投掷药水无视了Ambient 和 ShowParticles标签[Bug MC-98922] - Fishing hook / bobber cannot kill itself after 1200 ticks and bounces on land在1200游戏刻后钓鱼钩无法自尽然后在陆地上弹跳[Bug MC-99353] - Elytra becomes transparent when wearing enchanted armor在佩戴附魔装甲后鞘翅半透明[Bug MC-102888] - Stray overlay turns dark blue when wearing enchanted armor在持有附魔装备后流浪者骷髅的覆盖层变深蓝[Bug MC-105966] - Snapshot incompatible with realms message is missing快照不能用领域的错误信息翻译不见了[Bug MC-106040] - Command Feedback From “/testforblock” the Wrong Way Around/testforblock指令的反馈信息不对[Bug MC-106062] - Language pre-selection is set to “English (US)” even with different choice语言预选择是“English (US)”即使有了不同的选择[Bug MC-106586] - Snowballs Duplicate When Thrown在投掷雪球时也有雪球粒子[Bug MC-107172] - Hitbox of Marker “true” Armor Stands lets their names now appear above themmarker盔甲架的名字仍然在上面[Bug MC-107189] - Elytra still has big model with small mobs/armor stands鞘翅戴在小生物上的模型也很大[Bug MC-107321] - Marker armor stands can be set on firemarker盔甲架能着火[Bug MC-107494] - Cannot summon Vex with empty right hand/summon召唤不出来右手空着的猥傀[Bug MC-107550] - Curse of vanishing listed in “Miscellaneous” tab消失诅咒附魔书在杂项栏里[Bug MC-107555] - /debug command missing decimal places/debug没有小数的位置[Bug MC-107558] - Illager spawn locations keep original block刌民生成保留了原方块[Bug MC-107601] - /enchant command doesn’t allow to put “Curse of Binding” on skulls or pumpkins/enchant指令不让把绑定诅咒加在头颅或南瓜上[Bug MC-107623] - Observer Instant wire观察者瞬间激活[Bug MC-107631] - Smooth Andesite in Woodland Mansion is sometimes replaced by default worldgen blocks林地府邸中的平滑安山岩有时候被自然方块替换[Bug MC-107639] - Shulker Box can’t be read by comparators if placed by dispensers until block update潜影盒被发射器放置不引起比较器更新[Bug MC-107697] - Llama’s spinning羊驼旋转[Bug MC-107796] - When open the shulker box make the shulker glitches back and forth对着潜影贝打开潜影盒让潜影贝来回移动[Bug MC-107822] - Curse of binding cannot be applied to Elytra in Survival Mode.绑定诅咒不能在生存加到鞘翅上[Bug MC-107872] - Random cobblestone walls spawn next to Mansions在林地府邸周围有随机圆石墙生成[Bug MC-107882] - Comparator not updating when Shulker Box behind block is broken潜影盒被破坏不引起比较器更新[Bug MC-107977] - Item not shown in hand when middle click dragging用中键拖动物品不在手中出现[Bug MC-108008] - Hitbox of Marker:1 Armor Stands lets Passengers appear now ABOVE themmarker盔甲架的骑乘者在普通的展示架头部那么高的位置[Bug MC-108034] - Wrong armor_stand hitbox and hitbox update展示架的碰撞箱错误/碰撞箱更新错误[Bug MC-108054] - Observer rotates when being udpated, moved and then reloaded当给一个观察者更新让他激活 在他自己熄灭之前把他用活塞推出 在活塞还没推到位的时候退出游戏 再次进入游戏 观察者的方向就变了如果本来面向 +y 方向, 就会变得面向 +z方向.
如果本来面向 +z方向, 就会变得面向+x方向.
如果本来面向 +x 方向, 就会变得面向 +y方向.
面对负方向时同理. -y 变成 -z. -z 变成-x. -x变成-y.
[Bug MC-108076] - cartographer villager unlocking exploration map causes HUGE lag制图家村民生成探索地图时产生很大的延迟[Bug MC-108109] - Fire doesnt dissapear after death死后火不消失[Bug MC-108128] - Chaining too many observer blocks crashes the game将太多观察者连起来会崩溃[Bug MC-108159] - Duplicate structure file of woodland mansion room林地府邸的结构文件重复[Bug MC-108168] - Shulker box isn’t rotated correctly with structure block潜影盒被结构方块旋转的不正确[Bug MC-108222] - Incorrect value is written for unlimitedTracking tag in map data写入地图文件中的无限追踪玩家数据不正确[Bug MC-108317] - Inconsistent capitalization “Note block” in subtitles字幕“Note block”大小写有问题[Bug MC-108321] - Text does not appear in the action bar while chat is set to hidden当隐藏聊天时 动作栏里的文字也没了[Bug MC-108373] - area effect clouds created by exploding creeper ignore ShowParticles and Ambient tag被爬行者炸出来的药水云无视了ShowParticles和Ambient标签[Bug MC-108496] - Moving a powered fence gate with a piston doesn’t properly update the fence gate将被充能的栅栏门用活塞移动更新的不正确[Bug MC-108521] - Animals have trouble jumping up 1 block when led在被拴着时动物跳不上一个格[Bug MC-108560] - Inconsistent dropper/dispenser behavior from observer signal不正确的发射器/投掷器接收来自观察者的信号[Bug MC-108616] - “Local Brewery” achievement icon is an Uncraftable Potion本地酿造师成就的图标是不可合成的药水[Bug MC-108697] - Observers send out a 2 redstone tick pulse opposed to 1观察者输出2红石刻[Bug MC-108731] - maxEntityCramming counts passengers and ridden entities as separated entities instead of one combined游戏规则maxEntityCramming把乘骑的实体分开考虑[Bug MC-108865] - Fangs cannot be summoned on transparent blocks捕兽夹不能在透明方块上召唤[Bug MC-108877] - “Local Brewery” achievement can be obtained improperly本地酿造师成就可以被不正确的获得[Bug MC-108945] - The totem of undying appears on relog.重新载入游戏 不死图腾重现[Bug MC-108952] - Evocation Illagers run away from the player or villagers even when on the same team召唤师远离和自己同队伍的村民或玩家[Bug MC-109020] - Weird behavior with taged & markered armor stands.被tag或被marker的展示架行为奇怪[Bug MC-109021] - Bursting lingering water bottle produces an effect cloud发射滞留水瓶有药水云[Bug MC-109058] - Shulker bullet, small fireball, wither skull and fireball cannot hurt/hit vex潜影贝的子弹 小火球 凋零头颅 大火球不能打到猥傀[Bug MC-109078] - Entities become transparent when armor stand with elytra is rendered当给盔甲架带上鞘翅 实体变得半透明[Bug MC-109086] - Piston Extension have missing model textures for Structure Void推动的结构虚空紫黑[Bug MC-109150] - Player phases inside block pushed by piston when sneaking.潜行的玩家和他下面的方块同时被活塞推 玩家会穿过地板[Bug MC-109240] - Zombies picking up multiple items but only dropping one僵尸捡到多个物品 但只掉落一个[Bug MC-109255] - Fishing line has unlimited distance钓鱼线能无限长[Bug MC-109256] - Casting fishing rod while looking straight down freezes server向正下方投掷钓鱼线能卡死服务器[Bug MC-109269] - Player cannot cast a fishing rod while directly looking up不能向正上方投掷钓鱼线[Bug MC-109276] - Hopper clock spam empty lines in game output漏斗时钟在游戏输出里留下空行[Bug MC-109277] - Fishing rod bobber has incorrect nbt values钓鱼钩实体的NBT不正确[Bug MC-109290] - Fishing rod bobber floating in the air(Lost the gravity), when the mob died被钩到的实体死了 钓鱼钩仍然悬浮在那里[Bug MC-109306] - Shulker boxes lose their “Lock” tag when mined.被挖下来后 潜影盒的锁没了


正版启动器下载地址Windowshttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.exeMac/OSXhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.9特性列表 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要魔法上网。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验快照版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Mojang官方博客（英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细，很慢）
